channel.title: Platform – GAME ONLINE
channel.description: GAME ACRADE - HTML5 FREE PLAY ONLINE

item.title: Go Escape
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Go Escape is a skillful and brain relaxation game in fact. If you just tap to start without any thoughts about the rational path, you are hardly able to pass the latter levels. So if you want to pass every latter level like first one, please plan a route before loosing the organ device. Show […]
item.content:encoded:
Go Escape is a skillful and brain relaxation game in fact. If you just tap to start without any thoughts about the rational path, you are hardly able to pass the latter levels. So if you want to pass every latter level like first one, please plan a route before loosing the organ device. Show me your perfact route choice and subtle operation!
Use the mouse or your finger to play.

item.title: Monkey Banana Jump
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: This is a jumping endless game. The monkey is hungry. You need to control him to jump and collect as many bananas as possible. New fruits will give him magic power, enjoy!Tap or click arrow key to play.
item.content:encoded:
This is a jumping endless game. The monkey is hungry. You need to control him to jump and collect as many bananas as possible. New fruits will give him magic power, enjoy!
Tap or click arrow key to play.

item.title: Symbiote Rush
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Symbiote Rush is a platform parkour game. You need to collect symbiotic slime and parasitize human bodies with various special functions. You will become a symbiote who can take advantage of the special abilities of this human body.PCMouse click and drag to moveMobileTap and slide to move
item.content:encoded:
Symbiote Rush is a platform parkour game. You need to collect symbiotic slime and parasitize human bodies with various special functions. You will become a symbiote who can take advantage of the special abilities of this human body.
PCMouse click and drag to moveMobileTap and slide to move

item.title: Extreme Road Trip
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Extreme Road Trip is a 2D cartoon vehicle game. After completing the beginner guidance, you will know how to control the vehicle and develop your garage. It is time to enjoy all challenges and levels for your records. Even the 2D platform will test your driving skills and balance abilities!On PCA or Left arrow = […]
item.content:encoded:
Extreme Road Trip is a 2D cartoon vehicle game. After completing the beginner guidance, you will know how to control the vehicle and develop your garage. It is time to enjoy all challenges and levels for your records. Even the 2D platform will test your driving skills and balance abilities!
On PCA or Left arrow = brakeD or Right arrow = gasOn MobileTap on the 2 buttons on the screen

item.title: Level Up Running
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Level Up Running is a running arcade game. You can collect boxing gloves and fight weak boxers on the platform to defeat the final boss at each level. If you meet a boxer who is stronger than yours, avoid to fight him but to avoid him.On PC and MobileHold and swipe = move left and […]
item.content:encoded:
Level Up Running is a running arcade game. You can collect boxing gloves and fight weak boxers on the platform to defeat the final boss at each level. If you meet a boxer who is stronger than yours, avoid to fight him but to avoid him.
On PC and MobileHold and swipe = move left and right

item.title: Going Balls Run
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Going Balls Run is an arcade ball game. Control the ball to roll fast, boost speed, keep your balance, and don’t fall off the platform. If you are looking for the best Rollerball game, this game is your best choice.PCMouse click and drag to move, hold to speed upMobileTap and slide to move, hold to […]
item.content:encoded:
Going Balls Run is an arcade ball game. Control the ball to roll fast, boost speed, keep your balance, and don’t fall off the platform. If you are looking for the best Rollerball game, this game is your best choice.
PCMouse click and drag to move, hold to speed upMobileTap and slide to move, hold to speed up
